title: 现在还有谁有打末影龙的冲动？
author: guhaosen
txt_content: BOSS越来越多，末影龙都快成小怪了

replies.author: 暗夜Elen
replies.txt_content:
毕竟那么长时间了，也有那么多外围作品一直烘托
现在想到mc的boss一般人脱口而出的大概还是末影龙吧

replies.author: qiangshuiya
replies.txt_content: 做拔刀的天天喊着刷末影龙

replies.author: Willam_Che
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Abraham511
replies.txt_content:
Willam_Che 发表于 2018-9-27 23:50
修正EnderDragon
手...手抖....e打重了...

谢谢~

replies.author: xiaowei233v
replies.txt_content:
表示每次做炒鸡大特效的时候总是会用
/execute as @e[type=armor_stand,tag=xxx] at @s run summon EnderDragon
/execute as @e[type=armor_stand,tag=xxx] at @s run kill @e[type=EnderDragon,distance=..50]
懒得加tag
awa
